alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 4:28AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 19 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near blizzard conditions expected on summits along the Dalton Highway. Drifting snow may impact travel in the area. Heaviest snow will be along the south slopes of the Brooks Range.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
